description: A plastic printed copy of HK416A5, a modern descendant of the AR15 line of carbines. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less durable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.

A plastic printed copy of Remington 700, a sniper rifle popular with law enforcement agencies. This version does not have a magazine: it is a single-round bolt-action rifle - perhaps an an experiment or a design challenge. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less durable than its market counterpart, though more so than other Private Defense firearms.
